attributes.action: make a total change with forward thinking policies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Isn't it about time we had change from the top?  After losing manufacturing industries, shipyards, coal mines and other such industries, we were asked to change our work patterns and re-train with IT skills and other skills for a competive market and to keep us in employment.  How about a change from the top?  Be one of the first major powers to scrap nuclear missiles and then after the death of the queen, scrap the monarchy.  Let's modernise the top, cut out the hangers on.  As we have changed, isn't it about time they changed?
